com.cognifide.qa.bb.aem.ui

Class AemDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cognifide.qa.bb.aem.ui.AemDialog

  • public class AemDialog
extends Object
    This class represents dialog window. It has methods for opening and closing the dialog and access its fields.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String DIALOG_XPATH
      Xpath expression for selecting the dialog element from the page.
      static String ID_CQ_GEN

    • Method Detail

      • open

        public AemDialog open()
        Opens the dialog by double-clicking the component.
        Returns:
        Returns this dialog instance.

      • open

        public AemDialog open(org.openqa.selenium.By clickableArea)
        Opens the dialog by double-clicking the component using clickable area.
        Parameters:
        clickableArea - area to click
        Returns:
        Returns this dialog instance.

      • openByContextMenu

        public AemDialog openByContextMenu()
        Opens the dialog by edit option in context menu.
        Returns:
        Returns this dialog instance.

      • openByContextMenu

        public AemDialog openByContextMenu(org.openqa.selenium.By clickableArea)
        Opens the dialog by edit option in context menu using clickable area.
        Parameters:
        clickableArea - area to click
        Returns:
        Returns this dialog instance.

      • ok

        public AemDialog ok()
        Clicks OK button at the bottom of edit Window. Saves changes and closes the window (waits for the dialog to disappear).
        Returns:
        Returns this dialog instance.

      • cancel

        public AemDialog cancel()
        Finds the cancel button in the dialog and clicks it. All changes introduced in dialog's fields are ignored.
        Returns:
        This dialog instance.

      • clickTab

        public AemDialog clickTab(String label)
        Clicks the specified tab in component's Edit Window.
        Parameters:
        label - Tab's label as seen by the user.
        Returns:
        Returns this dialog instance.

      • getTitle

        public String getTitle()
        Returns:
        Edit Window's title.

      • okExpectingValidation

        public ValidationWindow okExpectingValidation()
        Clicks OK button at the bottom of edit Window. Assumes invalid data was entered and waits for the validation message to appear.
        Returns:
        Returns instance of ValidationWindow.

      • getActiveTabName

        public String getActiveTabName()
        Returns:
        Label of the active tab.

      • isVisible

        public boolean isVisible()
        Returns:
        true if Dialog is visible, false otherwise.

      • closeIfVisible

        public AemDialog closeIfVisible()
        Checks if the dialog is visible. If yes, closes it by clicking "cancel" button.
        Returns:
        This AemDialog instance.

      • getField

        public <T> T getField(String tabName,
                      int widgetIndex,
                      Class<T> dialogFieldType)
        Searches for the field of the given type, located on the given tab, identified by its index.
        Type Parameters:
        T - dialog field class
        Parameters:
        tabName - Label of the tab where the field is located.
        widgetIndex - Index of the widget within the given tab.
        dialogFieldType - Class that represents dialog's field.
        Returns:
        A dialogFieldType's instance that represents dialog field.

      • getFieldFromCurrentTab

        public <T> T getFieldFromCurrentTab(String label,
                                    Class<T> dialogFieldType)
        Searches for the field of the given type by its label, on the current tab.
        Type Parameters:
        T - dialog field class
        Parameters:
        label - field label
        dialogFieldType - type of dialog field
        Returns:
        A dialogFieldType's instance that represents dialog field.

      • getLabelFromTab

        public String getLabelFromTab(int index)
        Finds the dialog tab by its index and returns its name (label).
        Parameters:
        index - of the tab (starts from 0)
        Returns:
        Tab's label.

      • clickDialogFooterButton

        public AemDialog clickDialogFooterButton(String buttonText)
        Clicks button at the bottom of edit Window and expect for dialog to disappear.
        Parameters:
        buttonText - button label
        Returns:
        Returns this dialog instance.

      • setValueOfItemInCurrentTab

        public AemDialog setValueOfItemInCurrentTab(String value,
                                            String label,
                                            Class<?> dialogFieldType)
        Finds a field by its label on the current tab and sets the value.
        Parameters:
        value - field value
        label - field label
        dialogFieldType - type of dialog field
        Returns:
        This AemDialog instance.

      • getValueOfItemInCurrentTab

        public String getValueOfItemInCurrentTab(String label,
                                         Class<?> dialogFieldType)
        Gets value from field in current tab with provided label and field type.
        Parameters:
        label - field label
        dialogFieldType - type of dialog field
        Returns:
        field value as String
